nodes.text: The Breta Yaga system was a star system that was located within the Mieru'kar sector, which was part of the Outer Rim Territories region of the galaxy. The system contained Breta Yaga, an astronomical object that was the origin point of several pieces of art known as flatsculps, created by a non-Human species.
The Breta Yaga system was established in the 2009 reference book The Essential Atlas, written by Jason Fry and Daniel Wallace, which placed the system in grid square O-3.
